title: Too much social media usage might drive you insane
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Too much social media usage might drive you insane According to a new study from the American Psychological Association, using too much social media could be messing with your head. Veuer's Nick Cardona (@nickcardona93) has the story.
